qa_data.question: Where is the HOD of Computer Engineering Office Located?
qa_data.answer: You can find the HOD's office at the Poly Market, Before the Artisan Centre

qa_data.question: What is the duration of the Electrical Engineering program?
qa_data.answer: The program is a 4-year National Diploma (ND) or Higher National Diploma (HND) program depending on your entry level.
